name: Baldi's Basics 2D - Scratch
description:
Use WASD to move the player character. This game was made for a math project where I had to use some of the content we were learning and add it into a game. There are a few differences, such as the fact that you can't actually get any questions incorrectly, but that's the point for this game. The entire game is a 3x3 area with the main entrace, a hallway on the left and on the right, a cafeteria with two classroms in either side, and the backyard area. The game is based in the popular game caleld "Baldi's Basics".

Game Link: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/707374655/
